name: MooTooFast
description:
MooTooFast is a silly but satisfying casual game where you can launch a cute-looking COW rolling down the hill and try your best to fly as far as you can.

● Manage your MILK amount

MILK allows you to boost the speed and fly further. Make sure to obtain the MILK bottles to increase your remaining MILK!

● Control your BOOST direction

Your COW will not stop rolling. Find the right timing and boost towards the best direction to fly as far as you can!

● Build up your BONUS

The longer you fly in the air, the higher your bonus will be. Watch out for the obstacles and achieve the highest score you can.

Unlock more stages with your highest score!!!
